Information.Subtext: Connects to Grass Valley AMPP platform
Contains a queue of received messages.

Param.Name: WorkLoadGetState
Param.Message: Would you like to subscribe to getstate?

Information.Subtext: This will subscribe to the workload get state.
This is the key used internally by DataMiner to identify the table entries.

Changes.NewFeature: Added workload name to the Test Signal Generators
